DataElement.preferredName: CoPaQ Did Someone Accompany You to Health Center or Consultations Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Response indicating whether someone accompanied the patient to health center or consultations.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Cost for Patients Questionnaire Did Someone Accompany You to Health Center or Consultations
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire designed to assess an individual's expenses as a result of their state of health. It includes questions about out-of-pocket costs, time required for travel or for booking medical services, and loss of income.:A question about whether an individual had a caregiver or someone else accompany them to the health center or consultations.
